actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that local governments shall be entitled to payments from the Federal Government with respect to certain Federal lands which were owned or administered by any local government, or by any State, at the time title to such lands was conveyed to the Federal Government.

summary.text: States that local governments shall be entitled to payments from the Federal government with respect to certain Federal lands which were owned or administered by any local government, or by any State, at the time title to such lands was conveyed to the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to provide that local governments shall be entitled to payments from the Federal Government with respect to certain Federal lands which were owned or administered by any local government, or by any State, at the time title to such lands was conveyed to the Federal Government.
